info.title: Blackbaud CRM Prospect
info.description: Blackbaud CRM is a comprehensive enterprise-grade fundraising and donor management software solution built specifically for nonprofits and the entire social good community. Use the Prospect connector to manage prospects, plans, and opportunities.

get.description: Returns table entries for the specified code table.

parameters.name: code_table_name
parameters.description: The code table name.

200.description: Returned when the operation succeeds.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to view the table entries.

404.description: Returned when the specified code table was not found.

get.description: Returns result rows from the specified simple list.

parameters.name: simple_list_id
parameters.description: The simple list identifier.

parameters.name: paramKey1
parameters.description: For parameterized simple lists, this represents the first parameter key.

parameters.name: paramValue1
parameters.description: For parameterized simple lists, this represents the first parameter value.

parameters.name: paramSourceType1
parameters.description: For parameterized simple lists, this represents the source type for translating paramValue1.

parameters.name: paramSource1
parameters.description: For parameterized simple lists, this represents the source for translating paramValue1.

parameters.name: paramKey2
parameters.description: For parameterized simple lists, this represents the second parameter key.

parameters.name: paramValue2
parameters.description: For parameterized simple lists, this represents the second parameter value.

parameters.name: paramSourceType2
parameters.description: For parameterized simple lists, this represents the source type for translating paramValue2.

parameters.name: paramSource2
parameters.description: For parameterized simple lists, this represents the source for translating paramValue2.

200.description: Returned when the operation succeeds.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to view the simple list results.

404.description: Returned when the specified simple list was not found.

post.description: Creates a new unplanned contact report for a plan.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that represents the unplanned contact report to create.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully creates an unplanned contact report. The response body contains the ID of the new unplanned contact report.

400.description: Returned when the request body is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to create an unplanned contact report.

404.description: Returned when the specified plan was not found.

parameters.name: contact_report_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the contact report to update.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that represent properties of the contact report to update.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully updates the contact report.

400.description: Returned when the specified contact report ID in the request URL or the specified request parameters are not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to update the contact report.

404.description: Returned when the specified contact report is not found.

post.description: Creates a new prospect plan opportunity.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that represents the opportunity to create.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully creates an opportunity. The response body contains the ID of the new opportunity.

400.description: Returned when the request body is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to create an opportunity.

404.description: Returned when the specified prospect plan is not found.

get.description: Searches for prospect opportunity records using the given filter criteria.

parameters.name: keyname
parameters.description: The constituent key name (last name for individuals, organization name for organizations).

parameters.name: firstname
parameters.description: The constituent first name.

parameters.name: lookup_id
parameters.description: The constituent lookup ID.

parameters.name: exactmatchonly
parameters.description: Match all criteria exactly?

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter the results to the specified opportunity status.

parameters.name: ask_date
parameters.description: Filter the results based on the opportunity ask date.

parameters.name: ask_amount
parameters.description: Filter the results based on the opportunity ask amount.

parameters.name: designationuserid
parameters.description: Filter the results to the specified designation user system record ID

parameters.name: only_prospects
parameters.description: Include only prospect constituents?

parameters.name: only_fundraisers
parameters.description: Include only fundraiser constituents?

parameters.name: only_staff
parameters.description: Include only staff constituents?

parameters.name: only_volunteers
parameters.description: Include only volunteers?

parameters.name: only_primary_address
parameters.description: Only search primary addresses?

parameters.name: includedeceased
parameters.description: Include deceased constituents?

parameters.name: includeinactive
parameters.description: Include inactive constituents?

parameters.name: checknickname
parameters.description: Check nickname when searching?

parameters.name: checkaliases
parameters.description: Check aliases when searching?

parameters.name: checkalternatelookupids
parameters.description: Check alternate lookup IDs when searching?

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Represents the number of records to return.

200.description: Returned when the operation succeeds.

get.description: Returns information for a prospect plan opportunity.

parameters.name: opportunity_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the opportunity to update.

200.description: Returned when the operation succeeds.

400.description: Returned when the specified opportunity ID in the request URL is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to view the opportunity.

404.description: Returned when the specified opportunity is not found.

parameters.name: opportunity_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the opportunity to update.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that represent properties of the opportunity to update.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully updates the opportunity.

400.description: Returned when the specified opportunity ID in the request URL or the specified request parameters are not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to update the opportunity.

404.description: Returned when the specified opportunity is not found.

get.description: Lists the opportunities for a prospect plan.

parameters.name: plan_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the prospect plan.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter the results to opportunities with the specified status.

200.description: Returned when the operation succeeds.

400.description: Returned when the specified plan ID in the request URL or the specified request parameter is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to view the plan opportunities.

404.description: Returned when the specified plan is not found.

post.description: Creates a new major giving plan for a prospect.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that represents the major giving plan to create.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully creates a major giving plan. The response body contains the ID of the new plan.

400.description: Returned when the request body is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to create a major giving plan.

404.description: Returned when the specified prospect is not found.

parameters.name: plan_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the major giving plan to delete.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully deletes the plan.

400.description: Returned when the specified plan ID in the request URL is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to delete the plan.

get.description: Returns information for a major giving plan.

parameters.name: plan_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the major giving plan.

200.description: Returned when the operation succeeds.

400.description: Returned when the specified major giving plan ID in the request URL is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to view the major giving plan.

404.description: Returned when the specified major giving plan is not found.

get.description: Searches for prospect records using the given filter criteria.

parameters.name: key_name
parameters.description: The constituent key name (last name for individuals, organization name for organizations).

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: The constituent first name.

parameters.name: lookup_id
parameters.description: The constituent lookup ID.

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: The constituent phone number.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: A filter for the constituent address country.

parameters.name: address_block
parameters.description: A filter for the constituent address block.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: A filter for the constituent address city.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: A filter for the constituent address state.

parameters.name: post_code
parameters.description: A filter for the constituent address postal code.

parameters.name: exact_match_only
parameters.description: Match all criteria exactly?

parameters.name: constituency
parameters.description: A filter for the constituency of the constituent.

parameters.name: only_prospects
parameters.description: Include only prospect constituents?

parameters.name: only_fundraisers
parameters.description: Include only fundraiser constituents?

parameters.name: only_staff
parameters.description: Include only staff constituents?

parameters.name: only_volunteers
parameters.description: Include only volunteers?

parameters.name: only_primary_address
parameters.description: Only search primary addresses?

parameters.name: include_deceased
parameters.description: Include deceased constituents?

parameters.name: include_inactive
parameters.description: Include inactive constituents?

parameters.name: fuzzy_search_on_name
parameters.description: Use fuzzy search on name?

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Represents the number of records to return.

200.description: Returned when the operation succeeds.

parameters.name: constituent_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the prospect constituent to update.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that represent properties of the prospect to update.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully updates the prospect.

400.description: Returned when the specified prospect ID in the request URL or the specified request parameters are not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to update the prospect.

404.description: Returned when the specified prospect is not found.

parameters.name: opportunity_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the opportunity to delete.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully deletes the opportunity.

400.description: Returned when the specified opportunity ID in the request URL is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to delete the opportunity.

get.description: Lists the plans for a prospect.

parameters.name: constituent_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the prospect constituent.

parameters.name: include_inactive_plans
parameters.description: Include inactive plans?

200.description: Returned when the operation succeeds.

400.description: Returned when the specified constituent ID in the request URL or the specified request parameter is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to view the prospect plans.

404.description: Returned when the specified constituent is not found.

get.description: Returns prospect information for a constituent.

parameters.name: constituent_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the constituent.

200.description: Returned when the operation succeeds.

400.description: Returned when the specified constituent ID in the request URL is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to view the prospect summary.

404.description: Returned when the specified constituent is not found.

post.description: Creates a new prospect constituency for a constituent.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that represents the prospect constituency to create.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully creates a prospect constituency. The response body contains the ID of the new prospect constituency.

400.description: Returned when the request body is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to create the prospect constituency.

404.description: Returned when the specified constituent is not found.

post.summary: Create a major giving plan step
post.description: Creates a new major giving plan step.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that represents the plan step to create.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully creates a major giving plan step. The response body contains the ID of the new step.

400.description: Returned when the request body is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to create a major giving plan step.

404.description: Returned when the specified major giving plan was not found.

delete.summary: Delete a major giving plan step
delete.description: Deletes a major giving plan step.

parameters.name: step_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the major giving plan step to delete.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully deletes the plan step.

400.description: Returned when the specified step ID in the request URL is not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to delete the plan step.

patch.summary: Update a major giving plan step
patch.description: Updates a major giving plan step.

parameters.name: v_prospect_plan_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the major giving plan.

parameters.name: step_id
parameters.description: The system record ID of the major giving plan step to update.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that represent properties of the major giving plan step to update.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully updates the major giving plan step.

400.description: Returned when the specified plan step ID in the request URL or the specified request parameters are not in the appropriate format.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to update the major giving plan step.

404.description: Returned when the specified major giving plan step is not found.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully deletes the plan.

400.description: Returned when the request body is not in the appropriate format.

200.description: Returned when the operation successfully deletes the plan step.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object that represent properties of the stewardship plan step to update.

get.description: Returns the locations for the specified major giving plan (by resolving the constituent ID from the plan).

parameters.name: plan_id
parameters.description: The major giving plan identifier.

200.description: Returned when the operation succeeds.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to view the plan locations.

404.description: Returned when the specified major giving plan was not found.

value.description: The set of table entries in the response.

rows.description: The set of simple list result rows in the response. This may be a subset of the items in the collection.

id.description: The ID of the newly created major giving plan.
The ID of the newly created major giving plan step.
The ID of the newly created prospect.
The ID of the newly created prospect constituency.
The ID of the newly created prospect opportunity.
The ID of the newly created stewardship plan.
The ID of the newly created stewardship plan step.
The ID of the newly created unplanned contact report.

prospect_id.description: The system record ID of the prospect.

id.description: The system record ID of the major giving plan step.

plan_outline_step_id.description: The system record ID of the plan outline step.

prospect_plan_status.description: The stage for the plan step.

status.description: The status of the plan step.

fundraiser_id.description: The system record ID of the step owner fundraiser constituent.

all_day_event.description: Is the interaction an all-day event?

expected_start_time.description: The expected start time for the step.

expected_end_time.description: The expected end time for the step.

time_zone_entry.description: The time zone for the step.

actual_start_time.description: The actual start time for the step.

actual_end_time.description: The actual end time for the step.

interaction_type.description: The interaction contact method for the step.

other_location.description: The other location for the step interaction.
